title: Custom web for MARCONI NETWORKS & TELECOM
description:
They have additional Access level for his custom web.

Installation: 

cd /home/ssp/custom_apps/
sudo cvs -d your_ldap_login@cvsro.sippysoft.com:/home/ncvs up marconi/marconi_web
cd /home/ssp/custom_apps/marconi/marconi_web/
sudo make install
psql -U sippy < schema.sql

For each environment on this server, that requires the custom web modification. Otherwise no custom modifications will be applied to those environments, they'll use default Sippy web
